_sText:
I made this map because I find there arn't enough challenging bhop maps. It ranges from beginner to expert and has 4 long jumps in (including a ramp to long jump).

The setup if fairly cortroversal, you finish the map and you get to walk along the walls to taunt players who haven't finished. 

There is no water involved due to an error in my hammer editor.

This took me around 7.5 hours to fully complete, including the txt file and failing at making a radar.

Extract both files to steam/steamapps/username/counter-strike source/cstrike/maps

I am currently working on a new bhop map, that is abit more 'twisted'.

Please leave comments and crit, I'm needing ideas of how to improve.

Hope you enjoy the map, and happy bhopping.

Joelwade.
